title: (x) 17. Jüdische Kulturtage - FF Eureka Mono {Yves, Adriano}
content:
can somebody id this gill-inspired font. i have no idea.   
   
thanks, romesh   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411133801im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20350.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Porsche Carrera font - custom {gang}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411133801/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2038 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Lora Lee - (similar to) Ballantines {Mike Yanega} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411133801/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2042 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nike

comments.content: That's a Peter Bilak face. One moment please...

[FF Eureka Mono Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411133801/http:/www.philsfonts.com/detail.html?sku=FF01124903P2). You can tell by that typical lc 'g'   
it's a member of the extended FF Eureka family.
Indeed, Adriano. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411133801im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) Shared credits on this one!

Verdorie, de drummer heeft weer gewonnen!   
;)
